H0.text: Sun is the source of most of the Earth's energy.

H1.text: Cover is where most of the earth's energy comes from.

H2.text: Fire is the source of most of the Earth's energy.

H3.text: Heat is the source of most of the Earth's energy.

A4.text: The Sun is the main source of energy for life on Earth.

A5.text: The energy of this sunlight supports almost all life on Earth by photosynthesis, and drives Earth's climate and weather.
